name: Atmos
0:
”Alexa, turn on Atmos diffuser”
”Alexa, turn off Atmos diffuser”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Elevate your space with scent that inspires by design. The Atmos App works with the Wi-Fi-enabled Atmos Diffuser to deliver mood-boosting, memory-making, fine-fragrance quality scents, when and where you want them.

Connect Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our “Atmos Fragrance” app in App Store then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our diffusers in the “Atmos Fragrance” app and label each device with an appropriate name for its location;
3. Enable “Atmos” skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”;
5. Now all setup is finished.

To control your new smart Atmos Fragrance diffuser, you can use any of the following commands :
Alexa, turn on <device name>.
Alexa, turn off <device name>.
Alexa, set light on <device name> to <dim, high, off>.
Alexa, set intensity on <device name> to <1,2,3,4,5>.
Alexa, set rotate on <device name> to <on, off>.
Alexa, set <device name> to <scene name>.
